config_description: enable or disable keepalive on rpc/native connections
developer_understanding_on_working: The rpc_keepalive configuration in the code enables or disables keepalive on rpc/native connections. It is set based on the DatabaseDescriptor.getRpcKeepAlive() value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the rpc_keepalive configuration depends on the DatabaseDescriptor.getRpcKeepAlive() value, which is typically set during system initialization or configuration changes.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling keepalive on rpc/native connections can improve connection stability and reduce connection setup overhead. However, it may also increase resource usage due to maintaining idle connections.
